name: Personal Website
desc:
Utilized MERN stack to locally develop a fully functional blog website, including a context API, user authentication, and the ability to search for and query posts by relevant tags 
 Deployed to the web using Herkou at mern-blog-msoul.herokuapp.com, currently working to add image uploading and storage in MongoDB using GridFS

name: MERN Blog Website
desc:
Utilized MERN stack to locally develop a fully functional blog website, including a context API, user authentication, and the ability to search for and query posts by relevant tags
